speaker: User
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 Oh : hello PERSON_FIRSTNAME_3, can i check if this souce https://opentextbc.ca/writingforsuccessh5p/chapter/being-critical/#:~:text=The%20ideal%20in%20persuasive%20writing,reasonable%20address%20of%20opposing%20sides. is considered a book or journal?

speaker: User
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 Oh : it seems to be an online extraction from a textbook

speaker: User
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 Oh : im not sure how i should cite it as

speaker: User
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 Oh : okay, so i can treat my ref as book with retrieval date?

speaker: User

speaker: Help Desk
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Hello, how may I help you?

speaker: Help Desk
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : ah this is actually an online book, so you can cite it as such

speaker: Help Desk
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Be sure to include the retrieval date though, since the content may get updated in the future

speaker: Help Desk
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : yes, and do include the URL as well.

speaker: Help Desk
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : so something like this: Retrieved January 7, 2020, from https://opentextbc.ca/writingforsuccessh5p/chapter/being-critical/

speaker: Help Desk
message: PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : to be more precise, this is an open educational resource :D
